content: a circular version of my ten stitch blanket this garter stitch spiral is worked on only ten stitches with virtually no sewing up it s shaped with short row and any yarn and needles can be used i haven t tested this pattern with different numbers of stitches so if anyone tries this let me know what happens all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
